title: Implement frontend expense and category workflows
description: Build React views and client logic for listing expenses, creating/updating/deleting expenses, and managing categories with loading/empty/error and validation states.
acceptance_criteria: Expense List view supports reverse-chronological rendering and filter controls for date range and category.
Add/Edit Expense form supports create and update with inline validation messages.
Category Management view supports list/create/update/delete and handles category-in-use conflict errors.
UI prevents duplicate submissions while requests are in-flight.
